datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro1: Thank you very much for your interest in our company.
datenschutz.intro2: places great importance on data protection. Our website can generally be used without providing any personal data.
datenschutz.intro3: If a data subject wishes to use special services via our website, processing of personal data may become necessary.
datenschutz.intro4: If processing of personal data is necessary and there is no legal basis, we generally obtain the consent of the data subject.
datenschutz.controller: 2. Name and Address of the Controller
